website_summaries.verdict: Offers a unique design and durable build with ample features.
pros: Stands out for its attractive sun-like shape with digital readout on the base and temperature and humidity monitor
Has 6 brightness levels and 7 color options
cons: Can be difficult learning how to set the alarm clock

customer_reviews.title: Here comes the sun. 🌞
customer_reviews.text: Perfect alarm clock to wake up naturally. When not using as an alarm clock you can use it as a regular lamp. You can adjust the colors and brightness it can get surprisingly bright. Can display a variety of colors but not sure what you would use it for. I just use the whites - sunset colors. Does have a usb port to charge your phone. The alarm sounds are not blaring they start of soft and get increasingly louder. Very pleasant 100% recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Does not work as intended.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the idea of waking up with an artificial sunrise, however, that's not what actually happens. The light comes on at about 40% and jumps to 75%within 5 mins and then 100% (if you can call it that as it isn't very bright) within the next 5 mins. There is only one musical sound and the clock runs fast. So instead of peacefully waking up, I'm jolted by the light a half hour before I wanted to be and have used it less and less since I bought it. Shame because it is a really good idea, exactly what I had been looking for. I guess nothing replaces the real thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I like its light features. but I don't like how it has to make big "beep" sounds whenever I press any kind of button. I have to set the times if it's off when my roommate is not in the room because otherwise, it would just go "beep beep beep beep beep beep beep beep beep beep beep." like thirty times. But it's nice. I'm not sure if I'm waking up better but I like the light. To wake up better, you just gotta sleep earlier.
customer_reviews.author: College Customer

customer_reviews.title: Actually works!
customer_reviews.text: Must have gotten a bad unit the first time. Company contacted me after I returned it and offered to send a new one free of charge. This one seems to work exactly as expected. Very pleasantly surprised! Instructions are pretty straightforward. Color-changing "mood" light is pretty cool. I also like the wake-up light and bedtime (fading off) light. The temperature and humidity features seem to work accurately and the sound on the radio is decent. The buttons all work as they should and overall am very happy with the product and would highly recommend! Great unit for the price!
customer_reviews.author: S. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Soft colors!
customer_reviews.text: Color changing, alarm, radio, different soft colored moods, this is multi functional lamp! The shape is bigger than expected so well worth money. Design and touch feel is soft. colors are awesome change on its own by setting it up, I really the radio feature too.
customer_reviews.author: The Blue Star

customer_reviews.title: Complicated
customer_reviews.text: Returned because it was too complicated to operate. Using my dot instead to do the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did what I needed it to do.
customer_reviews.text: The light feature works well. The flute music is not very good and plays too loud. The buttons are hard to find in the dark morning.
customer_reviews.author: William Ahearn

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: Wish the light increased more gradually at the beginning and that there were more options for the wake up music.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Has made waking up a lot easier. My husband loves it because now I dont hit snooze 7 times before getting up. I love the sunset feature too. Wish it was a bit longer, but it definitely helps get ready for bed.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: After 2 months the Alarm doesn’t even sound most of the time
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Good wakup light for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I like the soft light feature, which wake me up naturally in the morning, and put me to sleep fast at night. The wake up sound is also very gentle, sound quality is decent. Recommended for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Alarm Light
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It looks really cool and also is a great way to wake up (with the option of light or alarm or both). The instructions are clear and easy to follow and it only takes a few minutes to set this up. I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Love waking up to light
customer_reviews.text: This has been so nice to have especially with the dark mornings. I wake up perfectly and feeling great. Great features which allow me to charge my phone right at the light. Very solid product, highly recommended, much better than an alarm clock.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon v.

customer_reviews.title: Funky...In A Great Way.
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Not just an alarm, not just a light... It's a radio, and a way to charge your phone. How awesome! I love the mood light option, so many colors... And you can stop on your favorite color. It's soothing to wake up with a soft light also.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa_photog

product_meta.title: AngLink Wake-up Light, Sunrise Alarm Clock with USB Output Interface, FM Radio, Temp Humidity Monitor, Sunrise & Sunset Fading Night Light, Multi-Color Mood Light (The Gift for Your Lover)
